metadata.title: CVE-2017-17527 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** delphi_gui/WWWBrowserRunnerDM.pas in PasDoc 0.14 does notvalidate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSERenvironment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conductargument-injection attacks via a crafted URL. NOTE: a software maintainerhas indicated that the code referencing the BROWSER environment variable isnever used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17527` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pasdoc - 0.15.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pasdoc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.15.0-1').
